Segment.name: F6X
Segment.comment: To identify automotive vehicles in a loss or damage claim

Field.name: VehicleIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Unique identification number stamped on the vehicle by the manufacturer

Field.name: AutomotiveManufacturersCode
Field.comment: Code (ARR) used to identify vehicle manufacturer

Field.name: DealerCode
Field.comment: A code assigned by a manufacturer to identify their dealers

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year
